mapper.insert: insert into clazz(name, room, begin_date, end_date, master_id, subject, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{room}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{masterId}, #{subject},#{createTime},#{updateTime})
mapper.select: select c.*, master.name as masterName, (case when now() > c.end_date then '已结课' when now() < c.begin_date then '未开课' else '开课中' end) as status from clazz as c left join emp as master on c.master_id = master.id
